BadgeDetail.Name: Contribute
BadgeDetail.Description: A framework for entry-level web literacy & 21st Century skills. Participate - Contribute: A group of local or global learners who reach a common outcome while connecting and learning online.

Task.Title: Why do we Use the Web?
Task.Body: You will create and research survey questions about their community's Web use, learning: contributing, collaborating, working open, and sharing.TaskClick the "Remix" button. This will open Thimble. You'll see some research questions we have created to get you started.Follow the steps in the tutorial. The tutorial will walk you through how to make changes to the code.Done! Once you're finished, you can save your work and share it. Log in and hit "Publish".EvidenceShare a link to you research project or take a screenshot of your creation!21C Skills: CommunicationProblem-SolvingCollaboration
Task.HtmlBody:
You will create and research survey questions about their community's Web use, learning: contributing, collaborating, working open, and sharing.

Task
  • Click the "Remix" button. This will open Thimble. You'll see some research questions we have created to get you started.
  • Follow the steps in the tutorial. The tutorial will walk you through how to make changes to the code.
  • Done! Once you're finished, you can save your work and share it. Log in and hit "Publish".

Evidence

Share a link to you research project or take a screenshot of your creation!

21C Skills:

  • Communication
  • Problem-Solving
  • Collaboration
Task.TextileBody:
You will create and research survey questions about their community's Web use, learning: *contributing, collaborating, working open, and sharing.*

*Task*
* Click the "["Remix":https://d157rqmxrxj6ey.cloudfront.net/chadsansing/26559]" button. This will open Thimble. You'll see some research questions we have created to get you started.
* Follow the steps in the tutorial. The tutorial will walk you through how to make changes to the code.
* Done! Once you're finished, you can save your work and share it. Log in and hit "Publish".

*Evidence*

Share a *link* to you research project or take a *screenshot* of your creation!

*21C Skills:* 

* ["Communication":https://learning.mozilla.org/web-literacy/skills/#communication]
* ["Problem-Solving":https://learning.mozilla.org/web-literacy/skills/#problem-solving]
* ["Collaboration":https://learning.mozilla.org/web-literacy/skills/#collaboration]

Task.Title: Welcome to My Mixtape

This will open Thimble. You'll see the mixtape we created to get you started.Follow the steps in the tutorial. The tutorial will walk you through how to make changes to the code.Done! Once you're finished, you can save your work and share it. Log in and hit "Publish".EvidenceShare a link to your new mixtape or take a screenshot of your creation!21C Skills: Creativity
Task.HtmlBody:
You will use Web-native music-production tools and share music through an online community, learning contributing, composing, remixing, sharing, and synthesizing.

Task
  • Click the "Remix" button. This will open Thimble. You'll see the mixtape we created to get you started.
  • Follow the steps in the tutorial. The tutorial will walk you through how to make changes to the code.
  • Done! Once you're finished, you can save your work and share it. Log in and hit "Publish".

Evidence

Share a link to your new mixtape or take a screenshot of your creation!

21C Skills:

  • Creativity
Task.TextileBody:
You will use Web-native music-production tools and share music through an online community, learning *contributing, composing, remixing, sharing, and synthesizing.*

*Task*
* Click the "["Remix":https://d157rqmxrxj6ey.cloudfront.net/chadsansing/8544/]" button. This will open Thimble. You'll see the mixtape we created to get you started.
* Follow the steps in the tutorial. The tutorial will walk you through how to make changes to the code.

Task.HtmlBody:
You will learn how HTML, CSS, and JavaScript connect to one another by using buttons and scripts to create storytelling prompts, learning about contributing.

Task
  • Click the "Remix" button. This will open Thimble. You'll see some storytelling prompts we created to get you started.
  • Follow the steps in the tutorial. The tutorial will walk you through how to make changes to the code.
  • Done! Once you're finished, you can save your work and share it. Log in and hit "Publish".

Evidence

Share a link to your new Storytelling Engine or take a screenshot of your creation!

21C Skills:

  • Creativity
  • Communication
Task.TextileBody:
You will learn how HTML, CSS, and JavaScript connect to one another by using *buttons and scripts to create storytelling prompts,* learning about *contributing.*

*Task*
* Click the "["Remix":https://thimbleprojects.org/chadsansing/50675/]" button. This will open Thimble. You'll see some storytelling prompts we created to get you started.
* Follow the steps in the tutorial. The tutorial will walk you through how to make changes to the code.
* Done! Once you're finished, you can save your work and share it. Log in and hit "Publish".

*Evidence*

Share a link to your new *Storytelling Engine* or take a screenshot of your creation!

*21C Skills:* 

* ["Creativity":https://learning.mozilla.org/web-literacy/skills/#creativty]
* ["Communication":https://learning.mozilla.org/web-literacy/skills/#communication]
